judgment_text:
15-CMP-9-1961
IN THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY
NAGPUR BENCH, NAGPUR.
COMPANY PETITION NO. 9 OF 1961
(THE LAXMI BANK LTD. (IN LIQUN). VS. IN MATTER OF NATIONAL COMMERCIAL
CORPN.)
WITH COMPANY PETITION NO. 12 OF 1961
(M/S. LAXMI INVESTMENT CO. PVT. LTD.)
WITH COMPANY PETITION NO. 14 OF 1960
(RESERVE BANK OF INDIA VS. IN THE MATTER OF LAXMI BANK LTD.)
WITH COMPANY PETITION NO. 8 OF 1961
(LAXMI BANK LTD.(IN LIQUN). VS. IN MATTER OF NAVBHARAT TRADING CO. LTD (IN
LIQUN))
__________________________________________________________________________
Office Notes, Office Memoranda of Coram,
appearances, Court's orders of directions
Court's or Judge's orders.
and Registrar's Orders.
Mr. Shriniwas Deshpande, Counsel for the Official
Liquidator with Ms U.P. Parmar, Official Liquidator.
.....

CORAM : ANIL L. PANSARE, J.

 JANUARY 17, 2025
The learned Counsel for the Official
Liquidator shall go through the record and proceedings
and prepare a chart showing present status of litigation as
also assets and liabilities, for passing further orders.
]
Stand over to 31/1/2025.

 (ANIL L. PANSARE, J.)
Sumit
Signed by: Mr. Sumit Agrawal
Designation: PA To Honourable Judge
